application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
site_name: Brent Cross Cricklewood Regeneration Area, North West London : South of the M1 Junction 1 / North Circular and to the East of Brent Terrace
description: Submission of details pursuant to the discharge of Condition 12.2 (Construction Worker Travel Plan) in relation to the following areas of Phase 1 (South); - The basement works to be undertaken in relation to Plots 12 and 13.  And the partial discharge Condition 12.2 (Construction Worker Travel Plan) with respect to the following areas of Phase 2 (South);- Basement works to be undertaken in relation to Plot 14; and - Initial works in relation to Plot 14, Plot 15 and their adjacent sections of highway (comprising part of Claremont Park Road (Part 2) to the south and part of High Street South to the north) ('the Plot 14, 15 and Associated Part 2 Infrastructure Initial Works') of Planning Permission F/04687/13 dated 23/07/2014 for the Comprehensive redevelopment of Brent Cross Cricklewood
